text:
The Night Prayer:
Lighten my darkness, Lord. Let the light of Your presence dispel the shadows of night.

#pray 4 #Ethiopia #Nigeria #Germany #UK #France #lockdown #NYC #DC #COVID19 #vaccine #USA #homeless #Chattanooga #christians in #China #Sudan #Iran #Iraq
